Job description
Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, LearnwithAI. Have you got what it takes?
Are you a full-stack engineer who thrives on complex challenges and is eager to make a real impact? Join our team to contribute to innovative products that deeply leverage AI, changing the way we work a
...
nd learn.
Join us to work on our exciting product portfolio:
‚Ä¢ TeachTap: Bringing historical figures to life using AI, offering an engaging, TikTok-like learning experience to make learning more relevant and fun.
‚Ä¢ Educational Content Generation: Utilizing the latest in generative AI combined with comprehensive learning materials to create captivating content.
‚Ä¢ TeachTower: A game-based motivation system inspired by popular games like Roblox and Minecraft, designed to make learning irresistibly fun.
‚Ä¢ Coachbot: A learning copilot that integrates with existing apps, guiding learning paths, recommending next steps, and rewarding daily progress.
What we offer:
‚Ä¢ The opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies, including the latest in Angular, React, React Native, and AWS serverless patterns.
‚Ä¢ The opportunity to learn and experiment with using generative AI to boost your productivity.
‚Ä¢ A team of exceptionally talented engineers from around the world as your peers.
‚Ä¢ The chance to work on products that are making a real difference in people's lives.
We're not just using AI as a buzzword. We're at the start of a thrilling journey with generative AI, experimenting and learning to fully leverage its potential and free our engineers from mundane tasks, allowing them to focus on what truly matters: design, decision-making, and understanding the far-reaching implications of different implementation strategies.
Showcase your skills, not just your resume. Take on our challenges: 15-min Cognitive, 90-min Coding, 180-min Technical Decision-Making. Excel and you'll face a decisive interview with our Hiring Manager. More than half walk away with an offer. Ready to unleash your potential? Apply today!
What you will be doing
‚Ä¢ Building modern web apps using top-notch libraries and tools.
‚Ä¢ Enhancing cloud-native backends using the latest serverless cloud patterns, including AWS.
‚Ä¢ Reviewing code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements.
What you won‚Äôt be doing
‚Ä¢ Spending time on minor bug fixes or features in outdated codebases.
‚Ä¢ Dealing with tedious infrastructure to keep poorly written products running.
‚Ä¢ Getting stuck in endless meetings discussing roadmaps and priorities or chasing people around.
AI-Augmented Full-Stack Principal Engineer key responsibilities
Basic Requirements
‚Ä¢ At least 4 years of experience writing production code for both the frontend and backend of web applications (any framework).
‚Ä¢ At least 2 years of experience being the primary technical contributor for a development team OR software product.
‚Ä¢ An openness to learn to use generative AI in your day-to-day development work.
Nice-to-have Requirements
‚Ä¢ Experience in using generative AI in your day-to-day development work.
About LearnwithAI
LearnWith.AI is an edtech startup that leverages AI and subject matter experts to cultivate a new way of learning. Our unique approach leverages 50+ years of learning science, cutting-edge data analytics and AI-powered coaching. In doing so, we can help students learn more, learn faster, and learn better - and have fun while doing it. We are a remote-first company that hires globally via Crossover.

Job description
Job Title: Fullstack Developer
Location: Multan (Onsite)
Salary: Starting at 50,000 to 150,000
Working Hours: 09:00 AM to 5:00 PM
Job Description:
We are seeking a versatile Fullstack Developer to join our team in Multan. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in both backend and frontend development, with expertise in PHP, Laravel, API integration, and modern JavaScript frameworks
...
. Additionally, experience with WordPress and Figma design is essential.
Key Responsibilities:
Develop and maintain web applications using PHP and Laravel for backend processes.
Integrate APIs to enhance application functionality and user experience.
Design and implement responsive and dynamic user interfaces using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, and Node.js.
Work with WordPress to develop and customize themes and plugins.
Collaborate with designers using Figma to translate design concepts into functional user interfaces.
Ensure high performance and scalability of applications.
Troubleshoot, test, and maintain software to ensure strong functionality and optimization.
Participate in code reviews and continuously seek to improve development processes.
Requirements:
Proven experience as a Fullstack Developer with expertise in PHP, Laravel, API integration, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, Node.js, WordPress, and Figma design.
Strong understanding of database management and server-side technologies.
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Strong communication and teamwork abilities.
Ability to work onsite in Multan during specified working hours.
Benefits:
Competitive salary with opportunities for career advancement.
Collaborative and innovative work environment.
Opportunity to work on diverse and challenging projects.
If you are a skilled Fullstack Developer with a passion for creating exceptional digital experiences, we invite you to apply. Join our team and contribute to our mission of delivering top-notch IT solutions.
How to Apply:
Please send your resume and a cover letter highlighting your relevant experience to info@progley.com with the subject line "Fullstack Developer Application - Multan."

Job description
Job Description:
We are seeking a Senior .NET Full Stack Developer to join our dynamic development team onsite. As a key contributor, you will work on end-to-end development processes, delivering cutting-edge software solutions. This role requires hands-on experience in front-end and back-end technologies, along with strong problem-solving skills and a passion for coding.
Key Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢
...
¬†Develop and maintain robust, scalable, and secure applications using .NET Core, C#, and related technologies.
‚Ä¢ Lead the entire software development life cycle, including design, development, deployment, and maintenance of web applications.
‚Ä¢ Design, develop, and implement RESTful APIs, microservices, and backend services.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including designers, QA engineers, and product managers, to create highly interactive, responsive, and user-friendly interfaces.
‚Ä¢ Ensure high-quality code through code reviews, writing unit tests, and implementing best coding practices such as SOLID principles and SOC architecture.
‚Ä¢ Work with cloud platforms (Azure/AWS) for deploying, managing, and scaling applications.
‚Ä¢ Migrate legacy systems to modern technologies such as ASP.NET MVC, Blazor, and Angular/React.
‚Ä¢ Optimize application performance and scalability, including troubleshooting and bug fixing.
‚Ä¢ Participate in technical discussions, decision-making, and the mentoring of junior developers.
Required Qualifications:
‚Ä¢ Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
‚Ä¢ 5+ years of experience in .NET development with proficiency in C#, ASP.NET, .NET Core.
‚Ä¢ Strong front-end development skills in Angular, React, HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.
‚Ä¢ Experience working with relational databases such as SQL Server, PostgreSQL, and familiarity with NoSQL databases like MongoDB.
‚Ä¢ Expertise in building and consuming RESTful APIs, Web Services, and Microservices.
‚Ä¢ Experience in cloud technologies like Microsoft Azure or AWS.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with DevOps practices such as CI/CD pipelines and source control tools (Git).
‚Ä¢ Experience in developing and maintaining enterprise-scale applications.
‚Ä¢ Excellent problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and the ability to prioritize tasks effectively.
‚Ä¢ Strong communication skills and the ability to collaborate in a fast-paced, team-oriented environment.
Preferred Qualifications:
‚Ä¢ Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, or other containerization technologies.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of modern UI/UX design patterns.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with Agile/Scrum development methodologies.
‚Ä¢ Microsoft certifications in Azure or .NET technologies are a plus.
What We Offer:
‚Ä¢ Competitive salary and benefits.
‚Ä¢ Opportunities for career growth and professional development.
‚Ä¢ Collaborative work environment with exposure to cutting-edge technologies.
‚Ä¢ Onsite amenities and a supportive team culture.
If you are passionate about developing world-class applications and looking to make an impact, we encourage you to apply.

Job description
Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, gt.school. Have you got what it takes?
Are you passionate about creating high-quality applications that truly matter? We‚Äôre looking for someone who values clean, modular code, aligns with our emphasis on high-quality work, and is eager to take
...
¬†ownership of a product that is pivotal to our vision. If shaping the next generation of grade school education sounds exciting, this opportunity might be perfect for you.
At gt. school, our focus isn‚Äôt just on creating another app; we're pioneering an innovative approach to learning by integrating modern techniques like advanced AI, adaptive computer-based training, gamification, and continuous feedback. At the heart of it all, our app draws inspiration from popular platforms like TikTok, allowing learners to have an immersive feed experience, making education interactive, engaging, and truly enjoyable.
This role demands ownership and independence; we believe that restricting oneself to front-end or back-end is counterproductive. Here, we advocate for full-spectrum development. If a tweak in the API or a backend validation is needed, we trust you'll handle it. Your decisions will significantly shape the product and ensure a seamless and intuitive experience for our users.
Your responsibilities will include transforming UI designs into functional app features, investigating and fixing bugs, and collaborating with our product and backend teams to ensure consistent functionality. While the fast-paced environment is challenging, the reward in terms of both personal growth and the tangible impact on students is immense.
If this resonates with you, and you're up for the challenge of making a significant difference in the EdTech space, we would love to hear from you!
What you will be doing
‚Ä¢ Taking high-fidelity UI designs and transforming them into interactive and efficient mobile app features
‚Ä¢ Integrating screens with our modern GraphQL APIs, ensuring data consistency and responsiveness
‚Ä¢ Participating in both automated and manual reviews to maintain our standards for clean, modular code
‚Ä¢ Collaborating with product managers and UX designers to ensure the functionality, reliability, and user-friendliness of the app
What you won‚Äôt be doing
‚Ä¢ Building components from scratch - you'll leverage existing high-quality solutions for efficiency
‚Ä¢ Getting stuck in endless approval loops - we value swift decision-making and autonomy
‚Ä¢ Isolated tasks - you will collaborate closely with a supportive product and backend team
Senior Mobile Engineer key responsibilities
Delivering a high-quality application that serves as the primary interface for students in our cutting-edge computer-based learning environment
Basic Requirements
‚Ä¢ At least 5 years of experience developing mobile applications
‚Ä¢ At least 2 years in a leadership role, making technical design decisions for mobile applications
‚Ä¢ Experience using React Native for cross-platform app development
About gt.school
GT School is an EdTech Startup that leverages technology, AI, and subject matter experts to cultivate a new way of learning. Our unique approach leverages 50+ years of learning science, cutting-edge data analytics and high-performance coaching. In doing so, we can help students learn more, learn faster, and learn better - and have fun while doing it. We are a remote-first company that hires globally via Crossover.
